class profils.models.Profile(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

A model to extend the user profile with additional information.

Attributes:

user (OneToOneField): A reference to the associated user. favorite_city (CharField): The user’s favorite city (optional).

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

id

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

objects = <django.db.models.manager.Manager object>
user

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a one-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Restaurant(Model):
    place = OneToOneField(Place, related_name='restaurant')

Restaurant.place is a ForwardOneToOneDescriptor instance.

profils.views module

profils.views.profile(request, username)[source]

View function to display details of a specific user profile.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest): The HTTP request object. username (str): The username of the user whose profile to display.

Returns:

HttpResponse: A rendered HTML response with the profile details.

profils.views.profiles_index(request)[source]

View function to display a list of all profiles.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest): The HTTP request object.

Returns:

HttpResponse: A rendered HTML response with the list of profiles.
